page.title: 01MUTHILL GENERAL SURVEY
page.content: Parish covers approximately {60} sq. miles. The village population is about {700} spread amongst just under {300} houses. There are two churches, two public houses and a small number of shops. {Farming} is the main industry of the parish, while many find employment in Crieff, Perth and further afield. {Muthill} is an old established village where traces of former industry, such as weaving, can be seen. It is on the {A822} road. The village was on the main drove route for cattle going South, to the market at {Falkirk}, and the drovers used to rest at the {Highlandman Park.} Nowadays, many holiday makers use the road, as it is part of a designated tourist route, linking many attractive areas of Scotland.
